column3: It was a real pleasure to talk to you, my boy! My daughter is lucky to have you!
Well, I think I'm going to go back to what I have to do around the house, and you to... whatever you were doing.
Listen, I think that was enough for today. I hope you'll have better manners next time.
Let me bother you a bit more.
I would like to finish my sentence before listening to you.
Don't interrupt me when I speak! You insolent fool!
My dear boy, you delight me! I can't wait to tell you about all my little stories! I think I'll come pass by your home immediately!
Well listen boy, I have the feeling that I bore you terribly, so I'll leave you be.
You are an insolent and disrespectful brat! How could my daughter chose to live her life with someone like you! Know that you're no longer welcomed in my home.
Oh! I understand! Go do what you need to do! I look forward to seeing you soon!
Of course, I'll see you soon anyway. We will have all the time to chat.
You surely have some gut to end the conversation on this! We'll continue from here next time!
I thought you were interested by what I was saying...
If you're so damn bored, you could at least tell me!
